                   LangId langid,

                     throws java.sql.SQLException
        Adds a name to the movie to the database.
        Parameters:
        movieid - Id of the movie.
        langid - The names language.
        moviename - The name of the movie.
        Returns:
        true if the addition succeeded, false otherwise.

      • getMoviesByName

        public java.util.List<Movie> getMoviesByName(java.lang.String search,
                                    User user,
                                    java.lang.Boolean seenParam)
                                      throws java.sql.SQLException
        Retrieves all the movies with a name corresponding to the search term. The search is not case sensitive.
        Parameters:
        search - The name to be searched for.
        user - The user whose movies are queried. If the user is an admin all users' movies are queried.
        seenParam - If not null, movies with the same seen value are queried.
        Returns:
        A list of movies.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • getMoviesByName

        public java.util.List<Movie> getMoviesByName(java.util.List<java.lang.String> searchList,
                                    User user,
                                    java.lang.Boolean seenParam)
                                      throws java.sql.SQLException
        Retrieves all the movies with a name corresponding to all the search terms. The search is not case sensitive.
        Parameters:
        searchList - The names to be searched for.
        user - The user whose movies are queried. If the user is an admin all users' movies are queried.
        seenParam - If not null, movies with the same seen value are queried.
        Returns:
        A list of movies.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
